overview: Juan Gutierrez is a Partner and User Experience Director at IDT Partners. Juan is responsible for overseeing creative art direction, user experience, and computer human interaction aspect of all IDT solutions. Juan has over 15 years of interactive design experience working with startups & Fortune 500 clients. His experience includes creative and user experience roles for companies in the Internet, Media, and Financial industries. Juan ran his own digital agency during the first dot-com boom and had worked for one of the largest global digital agencies. Juan holds a Bachelor’s of Art in Fine Arts from the Cooper Union School of Art.
